## Description {#details}

Functions in this group relate to arguments/parameters on functions.

Functions in this group expect <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> instances that correspond to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">llvm::Function</a> instances.

<SectionDefinition>

<MemberDefinition

Obtain the number of parameters in a function.

### LLVMGetNextParam() {#ga670f0e5258f93e51e6700309ae99dfbe}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetNextParam (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> Arg)</>}>
Obtain the next parameter to a function.

This takes an <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> obtained from <a href="#ga91ecd25200fd0f4868de70a1845a5929">LLVMGetFirstParam()</a> (which is actually a wrapped iterator) and obtains the next parameter from the underlying iterator.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l03034">3034</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l02658">2658</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMGetParam() {#ga9bd2822b01bf496c297a3daeeea63d52}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetParam (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> Fn, unsigned Index)</>}>
Obtain the parameter at the specified index.

Parameters are indexed from 0.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a8bf193a781a92cae52d7f9216d0824f8">llvm::Function::arg&#95;begin()</a>
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMGetParamParent() {#ga81dc96cc6ae8314a858ab41cdf35c763}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetParamParent (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> Inst)</>}>
Obtain the function to which this argument belongs.

Unlike other functions in this group, this one takes an <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> that corresponds to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/attribute">llvm::Attribute</a>.

The returned <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> is the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">llvm::Function</a> to which this argument belongs.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l03011">3011</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l02638">2638</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMGetParams() {#gaebe00246fb8c2af071d3eb2c27882242}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LLVMGetParams (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> Fn, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> &#42; Params)</>}>
Obtain the parameters in a function.

The takes a pointer to a pre-allocated array of <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> that is at least <a href="#ga01d328bab313262d58c0e5fd08e79764">LLVMCountParams()</a> long. This array will be filled with <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> instances which correspond to the parameters the function receives. Each <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> corresponds to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/argument">llvm::Argument</a> instance.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a8bf193a781a92cae52d7f9216d0824f8">llvm::Function::arg&#95;begin()</a>
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l02991">2991</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l02627">2627</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMGetPreviousParam() {#ga1cfc41108006d478ef87eec0d5a08d3f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetPreviousParam (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> Arg)</>}>
Obtain the previous parameter to a function.

This is the opposite of <a href="#ga670f0e5258f93e51e6700309ae99dfbe">LLVMGetNextParam()</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l03041">3041</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l02666">2666</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
